column3: a resident of lynn haven for over 38 years
column9: and was proud to be a hillbilly. leamon served his country as a smsgt in the usaf for 26 years. he enjoyed wood-working and making furniture. leamon was preceded in death by his parents
column10: lee moore and magnolia flannery moore. he is survived by his loving wife of 60 years
column17: and hannah grace rizzuto. graveside services with usaf honors will be held on tuesday
